languages.text: {n}Он делает слабый жест, указывая на свои глаза.{/n} "Я ничего не вижу. Дай мне минуту... понять, что со мной сотворили..." {n}Воздух вокруг Хейнрикса заметно холодеет.{/n} "Проклятье... я не чувствую своего тела..."

{n}He gestures feebly at his eyes.{/n} "I can't see a thing. Give me a moment... to ascertain what they've done to me..." {n}The air around him grows noticeably colder.{/n} "Blast it... I can't sense my body..."
languages.original_text: {n}Он делает слабый жест, указывая на свои глаза.{/n} "Я ничего не вижу. Дай мне минуту... понять, что со мной сотворили..." {n}Воздух вокруг Хейнрикса заметно холодеет.{/n} "Проклятье... я не чувствую своего тела..."

traits.locale_text: {n}He gestures weakly at his eyes.{/n} "I can't see a thing. Give me a moment... to process what they've done to me..." {n}The air around him grows noticeably colder.{/n} "Blast it... I can't feel my body..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼は弱々しく目を動かす。{/n}「何も見えない。ちょっと待ってくれ…やつらが俺に何をしたか確認したい…」{n}彼を取り巻く空気が冷たくなる。{/n}「くそ…何も感じない…」
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures feebly at his eyes.{/n} "I can't see a thing. Give me a moment... to ascertain what they've done to me..." {n}The air around him grows noticeably colder.{/n} "Blast it... I can't sense my body..."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は弱々しく目を動かす。{/n}「何も見えない。ちょっと待ってくれ…やつらが俺に何をしたか確認したい…」{n}彼を取り巻く空気が冷たくなる。{/n}「くそ…何も感じない…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希虚弱地指着自己的眼睛。{/n}“我什么都看不见。给我点时间……让我确认一下他们对我做的事情……”{n}他周围的空气明显变冷了。{/n}“真该死……我感觉不到我的身体了……”
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures feebly at his eyes.{/n} "I can't see a thing. Give me a moment... to ascertain what they've done to me..." {n}The air around him grows noticeably colder.{/n} "Blast it... I can't sense my body..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希虚弱地指着自己的眼睛。{/n}“我什么都看不见。给我点时间……让我处理一下他们对我做的事情……”{n}他周围的空气明显变冷了。{/n}“真该死……我感觉不到我的身体了……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Se señala los ojos con un débil gesto.{/n} «No veo nada. Deme un momento... para descubrir lo que me han hecho...». {n}El aire a su alrededor se vuelve más frío.{/n} «Maldita sea... No puedo sentir mi cuerpo...».
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures feebly at his eyes.{/n} "I can't see a thing. Give me a moment... to ascertain what they've done to me..." {n}The air around him grows noticeably colder.{/n} "Blast it... I can't sense my body..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se señala los ojos con un débil gesto.{/n} «No veo nada. Deme un momento... para procesar lo que me han hecho...». {n}El aire a su alrededor se vuelve más frío.{/n} «Maldita sea... No puedo sentir mi cuerpo...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Er deutet mit zittriger Hand auf seine Augen.{/n} "Ich kann nichts sehen. Gebt mir einen Augenblick ... um mich zu vergewissern, was sie mir angetan haben ..." {n}Die Luft um ihn herum wird merklich kälter.{/n} "Verflucht ... Ich spüre meinen Körper nicht ..."
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures feebly at his eyes.{/n} "I can't see a thing. Give me a moment... to ascertain what they've done to me..." {n}The air around him grows noticeably colder.{/n} "Blast it... I can't sense my body..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er deutet mit zittriger Hand auf seine Augen.{/n} "Ich kann nichts sehen. Gebt mir einen Augenblick ... um zu verarbeiten, was sie mit mir getan haben ..." {n}Die Luft um ihn herum wird merklich kälter.{/n} "Verflucht ... Ich spüre meinen Körper nicht ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Il désigne ses yeux.{/n} « Je ne vois rien. Accordez-moi un instant... pour intégrer ce qu'ils m'ont fait... » {n}Autour de lui, l'air se fait soudain plus froid.{/n} « Bon sang... Je ne sens plus mon corps... »
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures feebly at his eyes.{/n} "I can't see a thing. Give me a moment... to ascertain what they've done to me..." {n}The air around him grows noticeably colder.{/n} "Blast it... I can't sense my body..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il désigne ses yeux.{/n} « Je ne vois rien. Accordez-moi un instant... pour intégrer ce qu'ils m'ont fait... » {n}Autour de lui, l'air se fait soudain plus froid.{/n} « Bon sang... Je ne sens plus mon corps... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, hâlsizce gözlerini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Hiçbir şey göremiyorum. Biraz müsaade eder misin?.. Bana ne yaptıklarını anlayayım..." {n}Heinrix'in etrafındaki hava, hissedilir şekilde soğuyor.{/n} "Kahretsin... Bedenimi sezemiyorum..."
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures feebly at his eyes.{/n} "I can't see a thing. Give me a moment... to ascertain what they've done to me..." {n}The air around him grows noticeably colder.{/n} "Blast it... I can't sense my body..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hâlsizce gözlerine işaret ediyor.{/n} "Hiçbir şey göremiyorum. Biraz müsaade eder misin... Bana ne yaptıklarını anlayayım..." {n}Heinrix'in etrafındaki hava hissedilir bir şekilde soğuyor.{/n} "Kahretsin... Bedenimi sezemiyorum..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
